description: When winter arrives, the Gore-Tex Windstopper Softshell tights for men can’t wait to get outside. The Gore-Tex softshell on the front protects you from the cold and wind. While the brushed stretch knit on the back keeps the air circulating and ups the warmth and comfort. Perfect for active winter activities, come rain or snow.
name: Salomon GTX Softshell Tights - Mens
